Description: Bachelor's degree in Logistics, Operations Management, Business Administration or a related field.At least 5 years of experience in distribution center management.Knowledge of OSHA and other regulatory requirements, safety standards, and best practices related to distribution center operations.Strong leadership and decision-making skills with proven ability to manage staff and maintain positive relationships with cross-functional teams.Excellent communication, organizational, and problem-solving skills.Ability to work independently and make decisions in a fast-paced, high-pressure environment.Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite and experience with warehouse management systems (WMS), enterprise resource planning (ERP), and transportation management systems (TMS) is preferred.Job Details
